hasInternetConnection

public static boolean hasInternetConnection(android.content.Context context)
Returns:
true if the Internet connection is available on the device, false otherwise

decodeBitmapFromInputStream

public static android.graphics.Bitmap decodeBitmapFromInputStream(InputStream inputStream)
Decodes an InputStream to Bitmap without resizing the image.
Be careful, if the image is big this can become a problem because it will use to much memory.

Parameters:
inputStream - an input stream to an image
Returns:
the Bitmap

decodeSampledBitmapFromInputStream

public static android.graphics.Bitmap decodeSampledBitmapFromInputStream(InputStream inputStream,
                                                                         int inSampleSize)
Decodes an InputStream to Bitmap resizing the image to be inSampleSize times smaller then the original.

Parameters:
inputStream - an input stream to an image
inSampleSize - how much smaller that the image will be, for example, inSampleSize equals 2 will return an image 1/2 the size of the original
Returns:
the resized Bitmap

decodeBitmapFromFile

public static android.graphics.Bitmap decodeBitmapFromFile(File file)
Decodes an image File to Bitmap without resizing the image.
Be careful, if the image is big this can become a problem because it will use to much memory.

Parameters:
file - the image file reference
Returns:
the Bitmap

decodeSampledBitmapFromFile

public static android.graphics.Bitmap decodeSampledBitmapFromFile(File file,
                                                                  int inSampleSize)
Decodes an image File to Bitmap resizing the image to be inSampleSize times smaller then the original.

Parameters:
file - the image file reference
inSampleSize - how much smaller that the image will be, for example, inSampleSize equals 2 will return an image 1/2 the size of the original
Returns:
the resized Bitmap

decodeSampledBitmapFromFile

public static android.graphics.Bitmap decodeSampledBitmapFromFile(File file,
                                                                  int requestedWidth,
                                                                  int requestedHeight)
Decodes an image File to Bitmap resizing the image to fit the requestedWidth and requestedHeight dimensions.

Parameters:
file - the image file reference
requestedWidth - the final image width will be close to the requestedWidth (value is in pixels)
requestedHeight - the final image height will be close to the requestedHeight (value is in pixels)
Returns:
the resized Bitmap

decodeBitmapFromByteArray

public static android.graphics.Bitmap decodeBitmapFromByteArray(byte[] imageBytes)
Decodes an image byte[] to Bitmap without resizing the image.
Be careful, if the image is big this can become a problem because it will use to much memory.

Parameters:
imageBytes - image content in byte[]
Returns:
the Bitmap

decodeSampledBitmapFromByteArray

public static android.graphics.Bitmap decodeSampledBitmapFromByteArray(byte[] imageBytes,
                                                                       int inSampleSize)
Decodes an image byte[] to Bitmap resizing the image to be inSampleSize times smaller then the original.

Parameters:
imageBytes - image content in byte[]
inSampleSize - how much smaller that the image will be, for example, inSampleSize equals 2 will return an image 1/2 the size of the original
Returns:
the resized Bitmap

decodeSampledBitmapFromByteArray

public static android.graphics.Bitmap decodeSampledBitmapFromByteArray(byte[] imageBytes,
                                                                       int requestedWidth,
                                                                       int requestedHeight)
Decodes an image byte[] to Bitmap resizing the image to fit the requestedWidth and requestedHeight dimensions.

Parameters:
imageBytes - image content in byte[]
requestedWidth - the final image width will be close to the requestedWidth (value is in pixels)
requestedHeight - the final image height will be close to the requestedHeight (value is in pixels)
Returns:
the resized Bitmap

calculateSampleSize

public static int calculateSampleSize(android.graphics.BitmapFactory.Options options,
                                      int requestedWidth,
                                      int requestedHeight)
Giving a max width and height in pixels this method will calculate a good value to use in BitmapFactory.Options.inSampleSize.

valueInDipToPixels

public static int valueInDipToPixels(android.content.Context context,
                                     float valueInDip)
Given a value in DIP (density per pixel) uses the display metrics of the device to return the value in pixels.
